description: Number of prime factors of concatenation of numbers from n down to 1, with multiplicity.
comments: Strictly speaking a(1) = 0.Smallest number not yet factored is 656463...4321.
links: P. De Geest, Reversed Smarandache Concatenated Numbers, Prime factors from n down to 1
M. Fleuren, Factors and primes of Smarandache sequences.
M. Fleuren, Smarandache Factors and Reverse factors
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Aug 15 1999.
